name: Dead Chatline
description:
NOTE: This game was made in 2 days for the first JameAR jam (February 2022), so it's possible there may be some typos, bugs and such. 

CONTENT WARNING: This game discusses topics of death & the afterlife as well as difficulties during adolescence and adulthood.

~  ~  ~

Languages: Español (Latino) / English

~  ~  ~

You wake up dumbfounded, not knowing where you are. Yet, right before your eyes, you spot a curious app: DEAD CHATLINE, a virtual space where you can chat with an agent about your unfinished business and hope for your soul to be reincarnated.

Your agent's name? Mortimer (alias Morty). What will your conversation bring? 

DEAD CHATLINE is a visual/text based novel simulating Live Chat, a form of customer messaging software which allows a person to speak directly with one of the company's agents. 

~  ~  ~

CREDITS:

Story, Art and Code by Paprikee (story: Pri Karin; code & art: SwimmableBee912)

Music by Matías Jara

SFX by Pilar Hidalgo Lopez (Philow)

Translation by Pri Karin

Pictures taken from royalty free websites
